meals_detail.note: All meals with family (Chinese New Year Eve)

days.notes: Chinese New Year Eve with family. Only cost is train ticket (¥100 second class, Chongqing North to Bazhong East). All meals and accommodation provided by family.

accommodation_detail.note: Family home stay in Chengdu, no cost

days.notes: Spring Festival Day 1. Travel from Bazhong to Chengdu (¥80 train). Budget-friendly meals: Lao Wu baozi breakfast (¥5), Lao Qi beef lunch (¥20), Qinshanzhai dinner (¥50). Shopping at Taikoo Li evening stroll (¥150). Family accommodation saves costs.

Busy day: Panda Base (¥55), Jinli Street shopping (¥80), flight to Shanghai (prepaid, excluded). Breakfast at 82 Community Wontons (¥21), lunch at Mingting Xiaoguan (¥75), premium dinner at Aimuniu Wagyu BBQ Buffet (¥324). Shanghai SK Lusso Hotel (¥615). Shanghai evening transport: Bund walk (free) + two taxi rides (¥55).

Day 1 Chongqing: Use Metro Line 6 for more segments instead of taxis (currently ¥113 total) - could save ¥40-60 by using public transport

optimization_notes: BUDGET CLARIFICATION: User budget is €1,000 = ¥8,200 CNY (at 8.2 CNY/EUR), excluding purchased flights and shopping.

DAY 1 RECALCULATION (2026-02-11): Budget updated based on timeline conflict resolution. Previous Day 1 total: ¥1,347. New Day 1 total: ¥1,578 (increase of ¥231). Changes from updated timeline: (1) Added intra-city transportation ¥113 (previously ¥0) - includes taxi rides between all locations (route_2: ¥15, route_3: ¥15, route_5: ¥3 metro, route_6: ¥20 taxi, route_7: ¥15 taxi, route_8: ¥25 taxi, route_9: ¥20 taxi). (2) Activities updated: added Hongyadong (¥0, free), Laojun Dong temple (¥10), Drone show (¥120); corrected spa from ¥182 to ¥170 (per entertainment.json). Previous activities total was ¥334, now ¥452. Net activities increase: ¥118. Transportation increase: ¥113. Total Day 1 increase: ¥231.
If shopping excluded, Days 1-4 subtotal is ¥3,120 (still exceeds ¥8,200 budget by 61% for first 4 days alone).
Days 2-3 are very budget-friendly due to family stays (¥0 accommodation, ¥0 Day 2 meals).
Day 1 luxury choices (InterContinental ¥738 + spa ¥170 + drone show ¥120) account for ¥1,028 of Day 1's ¥1,578 total.
Premium dining on Days 1, 3, 4 adds significant costs: hotpot ¥120, Qinshanzhai ¥50, Aimuniu ¥324.
Shanghai SK Lusso Hotel is mid-range (¥615/night) and reasonable for the Bund location.
Transportation costs for Days 1-4: ¥250 total (Day 1 intra-city ¥113 + train Day 2 ¥100 + train Day 3 ¥80 + Day 4 intra-city ¥70).
Major cost drivers: Luxury accommodation, premium dining, paid entertainment (spa, drone show), intra-city transportation, shopping.
Consider re-evaluating Day 1 if arriving exhausted from overnight flight - spa and drone show may be worth the cost for jet lag recovery and unique experiences.

Days 5-21 major upcoming expenses: Shanghai Disneyland (¥475 Day 6), Beijing dance drama (¥580 Day 8), Beijing photography (¥600 Day 13), 13 nights Beijing rental (¥3,731 total), 3 more nights Shanghai hotel (¥1,845 total).
Remaining 17 days estimated at ~¥7,400 CNY based on source data spending patterns.
Timeline conflict fixes resulted in minor budget increase for Day 1, but schedule is now more realistic and achievable.
notes: Day 1 budget recalculated (2026-02-11) following timeline conflict resolution. Previous Day 1 total was ¥1,347. New Day 1 total: ¥1,578. Key changes from updated timeline.json: (1) Added intra-city transportation ¥113 - detailed taxi/metro costs for all 8 travel segments throughout Day 1 (Observation Deck→Huguang Guild Hall taxi ¥15, Huguang Guild Hall→Hongyadong taxi ¥15, lunch→Xiayao Li metro ¥3, Xiayao Li→Laojun Dong taxi ¥20, Laojun Dong→Nanshan Hotpot taxi ¥15, Nanshan Hotpot→Drone Show taxi ¥25, Drone Show→Spa taxi ¥20). (2) Activities updated: added Hongyadong (free), Laojun Dong Taoist Temple (¥10 admission), Chongqing Drone Show (¥120); corrected spa massage cost from ¥182 to ¥170 per entertainment.json. Attractions now include: Raffles Observation Deck ¥120, Huguang Guild Hall ¥32, Hongyadong ¥0, Laojun Dong ¥10. Entertainment: Guanyuan Zudao Wellness spa ¥170, Drone Show ¥120. Previous activities total was ¥334 (missing several items), corrected to ¥452. Net activities increase: ¥118. Net transportation increase: ¥113. Total Day 1 increase: ¥231. All values in CNY (Chinese Yuan). User budget is €1,000 (~¥8,200 CNY at 8.2 CNY/EUR) excluding purchased flights and shopping.
